{"step_by_step_thinking": "The resistance form in endodontic root canal preparation is not about the establishment of apical tug back resistance to prevent the apical root fracture during obturation. It is also not about the cavity form which is obtained for application of condenser in vertical compaction or lateral compaction. The resistance form in endodontic root canal preparation is about the cavity form which is designed to obtain for entry of condenser during obturation.", "answer_choice": "D"}
